20-0511.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a report on the California Legislative Black Caucus’s 2020 Bill Package.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Richardson spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Richardson and Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs.Councilman Austin spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.Vice Chair Uranga spoke.Chair Richardson spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialouge ensued between, Chair Richardson and Tyler Curley, Managerof Government Affairs.A motion was made by Chair Richardson, seconded by Member Austin, to approve recommendation, as amended, to come back to the State Legislation Committee with proposed amendments to the State Legislation Agenda that captures the City on the right side of racial equity and take steps to make sure the City Council takes positions of support on the California Legislative Black Caucus 2020 Bill Package.
